entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -25.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
